Usage¶

Installation¶

Not yet in an installable version. Just check content for now.

First function:

utils.fancy_dendrogram(*args, **kwargs)¶

Return a dictionary of data structures computed to render the dendrogram.

Parameters

  • Z (ndarray) – the linkage matrix encoding the hierarchical clustering to render as a dendrogram

  • ylim – upper limit to plot

  • p – parameter for truncate mode

Returns

list of dendogram objects to render dendrogram

Return type

dict
